alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Charlotte, southeastern Campbell and north central Halifax Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Darlington Heights to Wren to near Long Island. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brookneal... Phenix... Madisonville... Abilene... Cullen... Hat Creek... and Long Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
